Name: Record-NotFound
Text: The requested record was not found.

Name: Login-Invalid-Password
Text: Invalid password. You still have {trys} attempts before the account is deactivated.

Name: Login-Attempts
Text: You have already used access attempts and the account has been disabled. Request activation.

Name: Login-Inactive-Account
Text: The account associated with the User is not active. Request account activation.

Name: Login-Locked-Account
Text: The account associated with the User is locked out. Contact your system administrator.

Name: User-Exists
Text: There is already a user with the email:

Name: Email-Exists
Text: The email you entered already exists.

Name: User-Error-Exclude-Childs
Text: There was an error deleting child items (Roles).

Name: User-Invalid-Password-Code
Text: The password exchange authorization code is invalid.

Name: Account-Active
Text: The account associated with the User is already active.

Name: User-Invalid-Activation-Code
Text: The activation authorization code is invalid.

Name: User-Role-Exists
Text: This Role is already associated with the user.

Name: User-Role-No-Exists
Text: This Role does not belong to the user.

Name: Http-NotFound
Text: The resource could not be found

Name: Http-500Error
Text: An error occurred in the processing of the request.

Name: Validation-Max-Characters
Text: The {0} field cannot have more than {1} characters.

Name: Validation-Invalid-UserName
Text: The {0} field is invalid. Do not use special characters or spaces.

Name: Validation-Unique-Value
Text: The {0} field is invalid. Value must be unique.

Name: User-Instance-Exists
Text: This Instance is already associated with the user.

Name: User-Instance-No-Exists
Text: This Instance does not belong to the user.
